alert.note: Alert for Malheur (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 1:56PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT/5 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dry washes and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Dry washes within north-central Malheur County, Oregon. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MDT /500 PM PDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 253 PM MDT /153 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause dry washes and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Westfall, Little Valley. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
